name: Chiikawa Knit HARA-Maki Shorts
description:
'Chiikawa' Collaboration Appearance! Warm your stomach, knit belly wrap.

Size: H82～100 (cm) / Approximately 6 (cm) below the waist
Weight: Approximately 160g
Material: Polyester, Polyurethane
Manufacturing Location: China

※ Fabric: Moderately stretchy (all directions)
※ Due to the characteristics of the fabric with hair, individual differences and shedding may occur in appearance and color. Please be forewarned.
※ Returns or exchanges are not possible for damaged or soiled accessories such as hanging tags (paper tags).

name: Chiikawa Reversible Boa Hoodie
description:
'Chiikawa' and PEACH JOHN are collaborating!
A reversible boa hoodie with large food that features the faces of 'Chiikawa' and 'Hachiware'. It also has cute, three-dimensional ears, making it irresistibly adorable in photos.
The material is a fluffy and warm boa fleece.
It's long enough to cover your hips, with a snug silhouette at the cuffs and hem with ribbing.

Size:
 S/M: B75~84(cm) / Length 65 Shoulder 54 Sleeve 55(cm)
 M/L: B82~91(cm) / Length 67 Shoulder 56 Sleeve 56(cm)
Weight: Approx. 690g
Material:
 Outer: Polyester
 Inner: Polyester
Manufactured in: China

* Front fastener opening, double-layered, fabric: moderately stretchy (horizontal)
* Due to the characteristics of the fabric, the color may appear different depending on the type and angle of light.
* Due to the characteristics of the hairy fabric, there may be individual differences in texture and color blending, and hair shedding may occur. Please be aware in advance.
* Returns or exchanges are not possible if attached items like tags are damaged or soiled.
* Brand label and washing label are attached to the 'Hachiware' side. It's designed to be easily removable, but please store the washing label properly to ensure correct care.

name: Chiikawa Fleece-Lined Satin Shirt Pajamas
description:
'Chiikawa' and PEACH JOHN in a long-awaited collaboration!
A pajama shirt printed with various expressions of Chiikawa.
Additionally, the chest pocket features a cute embroidery of Chiikawa, and the sleeve cuffs and back neck have a 'CHIIKAWA♡' logo embroidery.
The fabric is smooth on the surface, with a warm and fluffy feel on the skin side, made of back-raised satin.
Even in winter, it doesn't feel chilly and can be worn comfortably.
The accent satin piping and waist ribbon are in a deep pink.
The cuffs of the top and the hem of the bottom are switched to a plain satin for a design point.

Size:
 S/M: B75~84 W60~67 H83~92(cm)/Length 62 Shoulder 50 Sleeve 40 Hem 55 Waist 65 Width 32 Front rise 31(cm)
 M/L: B82~91 W66~73 H90~99(cm)/Length 64 Shoulder 52 Sleeve 42 Hem 56 Waist 67 Width 34 Front rise 32(cm)
Weight: Approx. 380g
Material:
 Fabric: Polyester, Cotton
 Embroidery: Polyester
Manufacturing Country: China

※Bottom: Waist part with elastic and drawstring
※Depending on the product, the appearance of the pattern, the circumference of buttons, or fabric switching/fusing may cause the print to be interrupted.
※No returns or exchanges can be made if accessories such as tags (paper tags) are damaged or soiled.

name: Chiikawa Cocopita Sneaker Length Socks (Chiikawa)
description:
Total sales volume is 50 million pairs!The "Non-Slip Socks" are cute "Chiikawa" and collaborate!There are 8 designs in total.Let's enjoy fashion from the feet with easy-to-match sneaker socks♪
【Non-Slip Socks】Have you ever experienced trouble with socks slipping off when running or taking off shoes?These "Non-Slip Socks" reduce such stress on your feet.The uniquely developed "K-shaped stopper (*)" firmly holds the heel, ensuring comfort without slipping all day.*…Patent No. 6449036. The actual product has a non-slip feature on the inside of the fabric in a discreet color.
Size: Approximately H247×W88×D10mm  ※Ladies size (23~25cm)Material: Polyester, Cotton, OthersManufacturing Location: China

name: Chiikawa Kokopita Sneaker-Length (Chiikawa Bread)
description:
Chiikawa×The inescapable sneaker socks make their debut!

[Inescapable Cocopita]
Have you ever experienced the inconvenience of your sneaker socks coming off together when you run or take off your shoes?
Introducing 'Inescapable Cocopita', which has reduced the stress of such foot problems.
The uniquely developed 'Konoji stopper (*)' securely holds the heel, ensuring comfort throughout the day without slipping off.
*...Patent No. 6449036. The actual product has a non-slip feature in an inconspicuous color on the inside of the fabric.

Size: Approx. H247×W88×D10mm

name: Chiikawa Kokopita Sneaker-Length Socks (Momonga Charcoal)
description:
Chiikawa×Kokopita's inescapable sneaker socks introduce a new model!



[Inescapable Kokopita]
Have you ever experienced the inconvenience of your sneaker socks slipping off when you run or take off your shoes?
Introducing 'Inescapable Kokopita,' which has been developed to reduce such foot stress.
Our uniquely developed 'Ko-shaped stopper(*)' securely holds onto your heel, ensuring comfort throughout the day without slipping off.
*…Patent No. 6449036. The actual product has non-slip features in an inconspicuous color on the inside of the fabric.

Size: 23~25cm
Material: Polyester, cotton, others
Manufacturing location: China

name: Chiikawa Kokopita Sneaker-Length Socks (Momonga Purple)
description:
Chiikawa×Kokopita's unremovable sneaker socks have a new model debut!



[Unremovable Kokopita]
Have you ever had trouble with your sneaker socks coming off when running or taking off your shoes?
Introducing 'Unremovable Kokopita' that has reduced such foot stress.
The independently developed 'Ko no Jikei Stopper (*)' firmly holds the heel, ensuring comfort throughout the day without slipping off.
*... Patent No. 6449036. The actual product has a non-slip feature in an inconspicuous color on the inside of the fabric.

Size: 23~25cm
Material: Polyester, Cotton, Others
Made in: China
